data.comment: All instances of "{0}" will replaced by a list of allowed networks.

data.name: strBncOrganizationMayAllowSomeNets
data.value: It's unknown what networks can be connected to using this bouncer. Both the bouncer must be allowed by the network and the bouncer organization may allow connecting to the network. Unfortunately, we don't know what those networks are.
